headline: Two Bodies Remain Trapped in Rubble of Collapsed New Orleans Hotel
abstract: They replaced a tarp that, before it blew away, was covering the remains of a worker that couldn’t be safely retrieved from the partially collapsed building.
lead_paragraph: NEW ORLEANS — The partially collapsed Hard Rock Hotel at the edge of the French Quarter was already the site of tragedy — and, for several months as the authorities have been unable to enter the dangerously unstable building, it has been an eyesore.
